title: Teenagers shot in South Linden, police say it was accidental
content:
COLUMBUS (WCMH)–Police say two teenage girls were accidentally shot Friday night in south Linden.
Both victims were transported to Nationwide Children’s Hospital in stable condition. The shooting happened on East 21st Avenue between Lexington and Jefferson Avenues.
